# fixedSpace()

**Type Method**

Creates a new fixed space item of zero width.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor class func fixedSpace() -> Self
```

## Discussion

A fixed space of 0 width separates the shared background used in navigation bars and toolbars to visually group items.

## Creating space items

- **fixedSpace(_:)**: Creates a new fixed-width space item.
- **flexibleSpace()**: Creates a new flexible-width space item.
